          <item>
    <title>Morning Brief: Infosys may pack its BPO business into its existing service line</title>
    <link>http://www.computerworld.in/news/morning-brief-infosys-may-pack-its-bpo-business-its-existing-service-line</link>
    <description><p>The BPO subsidiary of Infosys might no longer be independent and the IT firm is quite likely bundling it into a service line in continuation of the transformational journey undertaken by CEO Vishal Sikka.</p></description>
     <category domain="http://www.computerworld.in/category/idg-new-taxonomy/business">Business</category>
 <category domain="http://www.computerworld.in/category/idg-new-taxonomy/business/technology-industry">Technology Industry</category>
 <pubDate>Fri, 13 May 2016 05:57:57 +0000</pubDate>
 <dc:creator />
 <guid isPermaLink="false">27347 at http://www.computerworld.in</guid>
  </item>
  <item>
    <title>Half the Web's traffic comes from bots, and that's costing you more than you think</title>
    <link>http://www.computerworld.in/news/half-webs-traffic-comes-bots-and-thats-costing-you-more-you-think</link>
    <description>'You need to closely scrutinize your analytics,' one analyst says</description>
     <category domain="http://www.computerworld.in/category/idg-new-taxonomy/software/applications/databases/big-data">Big Data</category>

  </item>
  <item>
    <title>Open Data Platform Initiative looks to ease fears</title>
    <link>http://www.computerworld.in/news/open-data-platform-initiative-looks-ease-fears</link>
    <description>In an effort to address concerns that the ODPi is a vendor organization designed to exert undue influence on Apache Hadoop ecosystem projects, the Linux Foundation organization announced a gold sponsorship of the ASF.
</description>
     <category domain="http://www.computerworld.in/category/idg-new-taxonomy/software/open-source">Open source</category>
 <pubDate>Fri, 13 May 2016 03:54:20 +0000</pubDate>
 <dc:creator />
 <guid isPermaLink="false">27344 at http://www.computerworld.in</guid>
  </item>
  <item>
    <title>Apple is approving apps for the iOS App Store much faster now</title>
    <link>http://www.computerworld.in/news/apple-approving-apps-ios-app-store-much-faster-now</link>
    <description>Apple's app review process takes about two days now instead of nine, in hopes to increase revenue from the App Store.</description>
     <category domain="http://www.computerworld.in/category/idg-new-taxonomy/mobile/mobile-oses/ios">iOS</category>
 <pubDate>Fri, 13 May 2016 03:53:40 +0000</pubDate>
 <dc:creator />
 <guid isPermaLink="false">27343 at http://www.computerworld.in</guid>
  </item>
  <item>
    <title>Microsoft's fascinating GigJam service is open to anyone who wants an invite</title>
    <link>http://www.computerworld.in/news/microsofts-fascinating-gigjam-service-open-anyone-who-wants-invite</link>
    <description>It's an interesting combination of tech that's aimed to help people work together quickly</description>
     <category domain="http://www.computerworld.in/category/idg-new-taxonomy/software/applications/productivity-software">Productivity software</category>
 <pubDate>Fri, 13 May 2016 03:53:25 +0000</pubDate>

  </item>
  <item>
    <title>Google to bring 'Gboard' features to Android</title>
    <link>http://www.computerworld.in/news/google-bring-gboard-features-android</link>
    <description>Gboard's ability to quickly perform a Google search and drop in GIFs would certainly be welcome on the company's own operating system.</description>
     <category domain="http://www.computerworld.in/category/idg-new-taxonomy/mobile/mobile-oses/android">Android</category>
 <pubDate>Fri, 13 May 2016 03:53:00 +0000</pubDate>
 <dc:creator />
 <guid isPermaLink="false">27341 at http://www.computerworld.in</guid>
  </item>
  <item>
    <title>Apache incubating project promises new Internet security framework</title>
    <link>http://www.computerworld.in/news/apache-incubating-project-promises-new-internet-security-framework</link>
    <description>The newly announced Apache Milagro (incubating) project seeks to end to centralized certificates and passwords in a world that has shifted from client-server to cloud, IoT and containerized applications.</description>
     <category domain="http://www.computerworld.in/category/idg-new-taxonomy/security">Security</category>
 <pubDate>Fri, 13 May 2016 03:50:48 +0000</pubDate>
 <dc:creator />
 <guid isPermaLink="false">27340 at http://www.computerworld.in</guid>
  </item>
  <item>
    <title>Report: Google will unveil Android VR headset at I/O</title>
    <link>http://www.computerworld.in/news/report-google-will-unveil-android-vr-headset-io</link>
    <description>You won't even need a smartphone for the new hardware if the rumors turn out to be correct.</description>

  </item>
  <item>
    <title>Evernote and Google team up to show Drive-stored content directly inside your notes</title>
    <link>http://www.computerworld.in/news/evernote-and-google-team-show-drive-stored-content-directly-inside-your-notes</link>
    <description>They may be competitors, but cross-service integration helps users, and that's a good thing. </description>
     <category domain="http://www.computerworld.in/category/idg-new-taxonomy/internet/cloud-computing">Cloud computing</category>
 <pubDate>Fri, 13 May 2016 03:50:07 +0000</pubDate>
 <dc:creator />
 <guid isPermaLink="false">27338 at http://www.computerworld.in</guid>
  </item>
  <item>
    <title>Nest gives Thread IoT protocol group a new president and a new open-source implementation</title>
    <link>http://www.computerworld.in/news/nest-gives-thread-iot-protocol-group-new-president-and-new-open-source-implementation</link>
    <description>Manufacturers who want to provide Thread support without writing their own software stack can now download Nest's Openthread from Github</description>
     <category domain="http://www.computerworld.in/category/idg-new-taxonomy/internet/internet-things">Internet of Things</category>
 <pubDate>Fri, 13 May 2016 03:48:36 +0000</pubDate>
 <dc:creator />
